Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of rosette and lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres with white pomegranate between them; exterior: at rim, band of oblique strokes between pairs of lines; below, painted decoration consisting of undetermined motif; group of short vertical strokes as filling ornament; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0466) (phase 2)
